so_32294988: Get Video-Duration with avconv via Python
Top-3 Scripts:
so_32294988: import subprocess
task = subprocess.Popen("avconv -i video.mp4 2>&1 | grep Duration | cut -d ' ' -f 4 | sed -r 's/([^\.]*)\..*/\1/'", shell=True, stdout=subprocess.PIPE)
time = task.communicate()[0]
print time

Explanations about Options.-r: use extended regular expressions in the script (for portability use POSIX -E).
Explanations about Options.-e: add the script to the commands to be executed
